name: MTLLibrary
desc: A collection of Metal shader functions.

items.name: var installName: String?
items.desc: The installation name for a dynamic library.

items.name: enum MTLLibraryType
items.desc: A set of options for Metal library types.

items.name: var functionNames: [String]
items.desc: The names of all public functions in the library.

items.name: func makeFunction(name: String) -> MTLFunction?
items.desc: Creates an object that represents a shader function in the library.

items.name: func makeFunction(name: String, constantValues: MTLFunctionConstantValues, completionHandler: (MTLFunction?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Asynchronously creates a specialized shader function.

items.name: func makeFunction(name: String, constantValues: MTLFunctionConstantValues) -> MTLFunction
items.desc: Synchronously creates a specialized shader function.

items.name: func makeFunction(descriptor: MTLFunctionDescriptor, completionHandler: (MTLFunction?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Asynchronously creates an object representing a shader function, using the specified descriptor.

items.name: func makeFunction(descriptor: MTLFunctionDescriptor) -> MTLFunction
items.desc: Synchronously creates an object representing a shader function, using the specified descriptor.

items.name: func makeIntersectionFunction(descriptor: MTLIntersectionFunctionDescriptor, completionHandler: (MTLFunction?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Asynchronously creates an object representing a ray-tracing intersection function, using the specified descriptor.

items.name: func makeIntersectionFunction(descriptor: MTLIntersectionFunctionDescriptor) -> MTLFunction
items.desc: Synchronously creates an object representing a ray-tracing intersection function, using the specified descriptor.

items.name: var device: MTLDevice
items.desc: The Metal device object that created the library.

items.name: var label: String?
items.desc: A string that identifies the library.
